friday.title: Kuv tuaj yeem pab tau koj li cas?
friday.welcome: Zoo siab txais tos rau hnub Friday, koj tus pab cuam Ai-powered!
friday.prompt: Nug kuv txhua yam lossis pib ua haujlwm tshiab.
friday.help: Xav tau kev pab? Kuv nyob ntawm no los coj koj.

authentication.forgot-password: Tsis nco qab lo lus zais?
authentication.reset-password: Rov Pib Dua Lo Lus Qhia
authentication.confirm-password: Paub meej tias lo lus zais

errors.generic: Ib yam dab tsi mus tsis ncaj ncees lawm. Thov sim dua.
errors.unauthorized: Koj tsis raug tso cai los ua qhov kev ua no.
errors.invalid-input: Thov txheeb koj cov lus qhia thiab sim dua.
errors.network: Network yuam kev. Thov txheeb xyuas koj qhov kev sib txuas.

tooltips.new-project: Pib txoj haujlwm tshiab los npaj koj cov haujlwm.
tooltips.automation-run: Khiav lub automation no los ua cov haujlwm tsis pom zoo.
tooltips.library-search: Nrhiav cov qauv, cov ntawv sau, lossis cov ntaub ntawv.
tooltips.space-invite: Caw pab pawg neeg mus ua ke hauv qhov chaw no.

footer.terms: Cov nqe lus ntawm kev pabcuam
